channel.title: Homes on Joana Malaverri
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Joana Malaverri

item.description: I am a postdoctoral researcher at the Computer Research Laboratory (LRI) at University Paris Sud and also a member of the LaHDAK group. Former member of LIS Lab at IC-Unicamp, under the mentorship of Prof. Claudia Bauzer Medeiros. My research interests include, but are not limited to, scientific data management, data quality analysis, and software development. Nowadays, I am currently working on the development of a solution to assess the veracity of Knowledge Bases based on spatio-temporal context.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I was a teaching instructor for the following courses: Relational Database instructor: Business Intelligence and Big Data course (Aug-Sep /2017 - Unianchieta). MC102: Algorithms and Computer Programming (2 /2017 - UNICAMP) link MC102: Algorithms and Computer Programming (2 /2016 - UNICAMP)
